name: Lower District (Slums)
description: A rusty, oil-smelling district where debris from the Upper District falls.

locations.name: Alto's Garage
locations.description: A small workshop filled with junk and tools. Home of Alto.

locations.name: Rusty Plaza
locations.description: The central area of the slums. A large gear monument stands in the center.

locations.name: Old Man Gear's Weaponry
locations.description: Sells heavy wrenches and modified pipes. Run by a stubborn old man.

locations.name: Scrap & Co.
locations.description: Sells oil, screws, and other consumables. Run by a chatty lady.

locations.name: The Leaky Pipe Inn
locations.description: Cheap lodging. The roof leaks oil when it rains.

locations.name: Dark Alley
locations.description: A dangerous path behind the shops. Rumored to have a hidden stash.
